p: The hemp EO showed MIC values corresponding to 8 mg/mL versus all S. aureus strains, including S. aureus 104, a multi-drug resistant strain isolated from a pharyngeal swab of a male patient ( Table 6). With regards to MBC, the hemp EO was shown to be effective at 16 mg/mL versus all S. aureus strains ( Table 6). The results obtained were confirmed using the AB reduction assay ( Figure 2A,B).
